title: Participant
description: Schema for validating participant JSON submissions in the Hacktober-Fest-Jam-2025 showcase.

name.description: Student's display name (full name or preferred handle).

github.description: GitHub username (no @ symbol, alphanumeric with hyphens allowed).

interests.description: List of one or more interests or areas of focus (e.g., AI, web dev, design).

first_pr_goal.description: Short description of what the student hopes to accomplish with their first PR.

examples.name: Tristian Sellers
examples.first_pr_goal: Submit a PR to improve documentation or fix a small bug.
